title: Build todo controller and event handling
details: Implement the controller that connects the model to the view. Handle all user interactions including adding todos, toggling completion, deleting todos, and filtering.
acceptance_criteria: Controller module that initializes the app
Event handlers for add, toggle, delete actions
Proper event delegation for dynamic elements
No memory leaks from event listeners
test_strategy: Integration tests simulating user interactions and verifying correct model updates and view changes
